Song.Title: Apollo
Song.Lyrics:
Just one day...

Just one day...

Just one day...

Just-just-just-just just one day...

[Beat drop]

Just one day in the life
So I can understand
Fighting just to survive
But you taught me I can
We are the lucky ones
We are, we are
Oh we are the lucky ones
We are, we are

[Beat drop]

Just one day...

Just one day...

Just one day...

Just one day in the life
So I can understand
Fighting just to survive
But you taught me I can
We are the lucky ones
We are, we are
Oh we are the lucky ones
We are, we are

[Beat drop]

Just one day...

Just one day...
